overview:
Shane Doyle is Director of Sales at 140 Proof, the social app network.

Shane is also the founder of Hashgram, a web-based search and share discovery platform for Instagram.

Prior to these ventures, Shane formed Madre Software, an ERP software and services group that worked on business strategy and software deployment for mid-market accounts.

Shane’s roots trace back to Y2K legend Compuware followed by application server pioneer Bluestone before delivering digital applications at powerhouse Organic and the nimble yet formidable EXO.

Along the way, Shane has been involved in two IPO’s (Bluestone ‘99 and Organic ‘00) and formed or managed multiple startups including JustCrew, DeveloperZero and digital agency EXO.

With work comes the balance of life and Shane enjoys nothing more than raising his two children and coaching rowing at his alma mater.

Specialties: advertising, strategy, client relationship management, social studies and hype.

degrees.subject: Fox School of Business and Management
